EnumProperty.Name: FrameWorkInteraction
EnumProperty.Description: Options to control framework verification process.

EnumValue.Name: DvOn
EnumValue.Description: Framework verifier is not enabled. Basic framework verification is enabled as part of driver verifier and if KMDF version is 1.9 or higher.

StringListProperty.Name: KmdfServiceNamesToVerify
StringListProperty.Description: List of KMDF driver service names to monitor using verifier.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableIrqlChecks
BoolProperty.Description: Enable IRQL checks and critical memory leak checks.

BoolProperty.Name: ForwardCompatibleCheck
BoolProperty.Description: Enable checks created after the current driver version.

EnumProperty.Name: ForwardProgressTest
EnumProperty.Description: Options for testing forward progress handling of your driver.

EnumValue.Name: None
EnumValue.Description: No faults will be simulated to test the forward progress handling of your driver.

EnumValue.Name: All
EnumValue.Description: All Io requests destined for a forward progress queue will appear to fail, relying on your driver's forward progress handling.

EnumValue.Name: Random
EnumValue.Description: Randomly fail Io requests destined for a forward progress queue.

StringProperty.Name: TrackHandles
StringProperty.Description: List of object handle types to track.

BoolProperty.Name: EnableKMDFLoaderMessages
BoolProperty.Description: Enable KMDF loader messages through debugger. A reboot of the target computer is required to enable this.

EnumProperty.Name: LoggingMemPages
EnumProperty.Description: Number of non-paged pool pages (1-10) to allocate for kernel event trace logs.

EnumValue.Name: Runtime
EnumValue.Description: Number of pages depends on the KMDF runtime. Starting with KMDF 1.9 the runtime uses more pages when verification is enabled with verbose logging.

StringProperty.Name: FailAllocCount
StringProperty.Description: Number of succesful memory allocations before starting to fail all memory allocations.
